absent less= (supremum _ (formulae@(0 less= s, formulae@(t less= n, absolute-value@(s - t) less= n * delta))))@(absolute-value@(Y - s - Y _ t))
absent less= (maximum _ (1 less= j less= delimited-[]@(n * delta) + 1))@((maximum _ (0 less= k less= n + 1))@(absolute-value@(S _ (j + k) - S _ k)))
absent less= (maximum _ (1 less= j less= delimited-[]@(n * delta) + 1))@((maximum _ (0 less= k less= n + 1))@(absolute-value@(S _ (j + k) - S _ k)))

para.p: so applying Lemma ,

Math.text: limit _ (delta downarrow 0)@limit-supremum _ (n to infinity)@P@(@supremum _ (formulae@(0 less= s, formulae@(t less= 1, absolute-value@(s - t) less= delta)))@|@(X ^ n) _ s@-@(X ^ n) _ t@|@>@epsilon@)@less=@limit _ (delta downarrow 0)@limit-supremum _ (n to infinity)@P@(@maximum _ (1 less= j less= delimited-[]@(n * delta) + 1)@maximum _ (0 less= k less= n + 1)@|@S _ (j + k)@-@S _ k@|@>@n ^ (1 / 2)@epsilon@)@to@0@PUNCT

para.p:
from which we get that
Γ
is tight in
P E
. ∎
